idea-plugin.name: LLM Code Review
idea-plugin.description: This plugin integrates with IntelliJ IDEA to facilitate automated code reviews using a Language Learning Model (LLM). It analyzes changes in Java files and generates comprehensive review prompts, enhancing code quality and developer productivity.

action.description: Initiates an analysis of modified Java files to create detailed code review prompts, aiding developers in identifying potential issues and improvements.
